title: I'll Praise My Maker While I've Breath

lyrics.text:
Happy are they whose hopes rely on Israel's God, who made the sky and earth and seas, with all their train;
whose truth for ever stands secure, who saves th'oppressed and feeds the poor, for none shall find God's promise vain.

The Lord pours eyesight on the blind; the Lord supports the fainting mind and sends the laboring conscience peace.
God helps the stranger in distress, the widow and the fatherless, and grants the prisoner sweet release.

author: Isaac Watts (1719)
